nodes.text: Vitas Varnas (born June 16, 1992) is an Australian actor, writer and producer.

In 2017, Varnas was featured in episode #4.4 "Inside "Kindred" & "Crawler Commandeers" of Rebels Recon where he had asked Pablo Hidalgo about the status of Yavin 4 as a Sith world in canon, and again in 2018 he was featured in the episode "Inside Jedi Night & DUME" asking about the X-Wing's capabilities of attacking with locked S-foils.

Varnas' notable work includes the video game Paradigm, appearing as the character Starjakk in the Doctor Who spin-off book The Essential Book of K9, and as a writer for the video game trivia website Did You Know Gaming?
